user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement a secure login system with multi-factor authentication.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication mechanism that includes username, password, and multi-factor verification (such as OTP, biometric, or token-based authentication). Ensure encryption of sensitive credentials, session management, and automatic logout after inactivity. The system should integrate with existing identity management tools and support password recovery workflows.

epics.title: User Profile Management and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Enable users to manage their profiles and implement role-based access control.
epics.description: Create a module for profile management allowing users to view and update their personal details. Implement role-based access controls to limit data visibility and feature accessibility based on user type and authorization level. Ensure that changes to roles and permissions are tracked for audit purposes.

epics.title: Responsive and Adaptive UI Design
epics.summary: Design a responsive interface for desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms.
epics.description: Deliver a consistent and intuitive user interface that adapts fluidly to various device types and screen sizes. The interface should emphasize simplicity, fast navigation, and clear organization of banking services. Conduct usability testing to validate user-friendly interactions and visual consistency.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Display
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard showing eligible products and services.
epics.description: Develop a personalized dashboard that displays relevant banking products, accounts, loan offers, and services tailored to the user’s profile and eligibility. Integrate data from the core banking system to show real-time balances, account summaries, and product recommendations.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable users to submit new account requests and modify existing services.
epics.description: Build streamlined workflows allowing customers to initiate new account openings and request service modifications with minimal input. Include digital forms, embedded validation, and guided steps for completion. Ensure each workflow supports partial completion and continuation at a later time, with uploaded documents saved securely.

epics.title: Document Upload and Application Continuation
epics.summary: Allow users to upload documents and resume incomplete applications.
epics.description: Implement a feature for users to securely upload required documents and save in-progress applications. Ensure that all uploaded files are encrypted and linked to respective workflows, with the ability to resume submission at any time without data loss.

epics.title: Real-Time Notifications and Request Tracking
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications for user requests.
epics.description: Develop a system for tracking submitted applications and service requests in real time. Integrate email and portal-based notifications to inform users of status changes. Provide a central place within the dashboard for viewing current and historical requests with timestamps and processing details.

epics.title: Interaction History and Activity Logging
epics.summary: Maintain a detailed record of user interactions and activities.
epics.description: Implement an audit trail that stores all customer interactions and actions within the portal, including login events, submissions, updates, and downloads. Ensure this history is accessible to the user for transparency and to administrators for compliance monitoring.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate self-service portal with existing banking systems.
epics.description: Build robust APIs and middleware to allow seamless data exchange between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system. Synchronize customer data, product eligibility, and transaction information while maintaining performance through local caching and database optimization.

epics.title: Data Security, Compliance, and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Ensure data security, compliance, and optimal portal performance.
epics.description: Implement strong encryption, data masking, and compliance measures in accordance with banking standards (e.g., PCI DSS, GDPR). Include vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, and performance optimization to maintain reliability and response speed under heavy load.

user_stories.title: Implement Username and Password Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in using a username and password, so that my account is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can log in using a valid username and password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they enter the correct username and password, then they should be logged in successfully.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account has an additional layer of security.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User is prompted for a second factor (OTP, biometric, or token-based) after entering username and password.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a logged-in user, when they attempt to access secure areas, then they must provide a second factor for authentication.

user_stories.title: Implement Password Recovery Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to recover my account in case I forget my password, so that I can regain access without starting over.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can recover account via email or SMS code.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user who forgot their password, when they request recovery, then they should receive a code via email or SMS to create a new password.

user_stories.epic_title: User Profile Management and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Allow Users to Update Profile Details
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to update my profile details, so that my personal information remains current and accurate.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can view and edit their personal profile details.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they access their profile, then they should be able to update their personal details and save changes.

user_stories.epic_title: User Profile Management and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles and permissions, so that access to data and features is controlled based on user type.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admin can assign roles and set permissions; users have access only to allowed features.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they log in, then they should only see features and data relevant to their role.

user_stories.title: Design Responsive Interface for Multiple Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal interface to adapt to my device, so that I have a consistent experience regardless of the device I use.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interface adapts fluidly across desktop, tablet, and mobile screens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user on any device, when they access the portal, then the interface should be responsive and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Display Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see a personalized dashboard, so that I can quickly access relevant products and services.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User sees tailored products and services based on their profile and eligibility.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a set profile, when they log in, then the dashboard should display personalized products and services.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Enable Account Opening Workflows
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to open a new account easily, so that I can start using banking services quickly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can initiate and complete new account opening with minimal steps.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they start the account opening process, then they should be guided through completion with all necessary validations.

user_stories.title: Allow Secure Document Uploads
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload required documents securely, so that my applications are processed without physical visits.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can upload documents securely linked to their applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they upload a document, then it should be encrypted and linked to the relevant workflow.

user_stories.title: Provide Real-Time Request Tracking
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to track my service requests in real time, so that I am always aware of their status.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can view real-time status updates of their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a pending request, when they check the status, then they should see the latest processing details and timestamps.
